explanation: [0-0] A yellow figure kneels on a white platform against a blue sky background.

[0-4] The yellow figure raises its hands and stands on the white platform. Then the platform rises, revealing gray stripes underneath. The platform transforms into a white square creature with a crying expression and flies away, carrying the yellow figure.

[4-14] The scene switches to a dark room. The yellow figure, holding red meat, stands beside a furnace. As the yellow figure stands up, an interface labeled "Furnace" appears above it, showing the process of cooking raw meat. The white creature floats in from the left. The yellow figure takes the cooked meat from the furnace and offers it to the white creature. The white creature rejects the cooked meat, which turns into snowflakes and dissipates. The yellow figure then hugs the white creature.
